title: IOL 2024 Problem 1
column14: Verb agreement with subject and object across three numbers (sg/du/pl); Chukotko-Kamchatkan family

title: IOL 2024 Problem 2
column15: Possessive constructions with gender/number marking and agreement; includes animal images; language isolate from Tanzania

title: IOL 2024 Problem 3
column15: Family tree puzzle with kinship terms; Yam family from Papua New Guinea; features sister exchange marriage practice

title: IOL 2024 Problem 4
column15: Semantic composition puzzle with scrambled translations; compound word formation; Naduhup family from Brazilian Amazonas

title: IOL 2024 Problem 5
notes: Gender-based dialectal variation (genderlects); Pama-Nyungan family; verb agreement with subject/object marking; only 3 speakers; parallel dialect systems
